column2: Borr Drilling Ltd. engages in the provision of drilling services to the oil and gas exploration and production industry. The firm focuses on acquiring and operating drilling assets. The firm's rigs have the capacity to drill to a depth of approximately 35,000 feet while operating in water depths ranging from 30 to 400 feet. The firm's fleet includes Borr Drilling Ran and Borr Drilling Frigg. Borr Drilling Ran is an ABS A1 Self-Elevating Drilling Unit. Borr Drilling Ran has a length of approximately 250 feet, a breadth of over 370 feet and a depth of approximately 30 feet. Borr Drilling Frigg is an ABS A1 Self-Elevating Drilling Unit. Borr Drilling Frigg has a length of approximately 250 feet, a breadth of over 230 feet and a depth of approximately 30 feet. Borr Drilling Frigg has a spud can diameter of approximately 60 feet.
